mapper.select:
select
from HZ_RELEVANCE_BASIC_CHANGE where RB_PROJECT_UID = #{rbProjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CHANGE_VERSION = (select MAX(CHANGE_VERSION) from HZ_RELEVANCE_BASIC_CHANGE where RB_PROJECT_UID = #{rbProjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from HZ_RELEVANCE_BASIC_CHANGE where RB_PROJECT_UID = #{projectPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CHANGE_VERSION = (select MAX(CHANGE_VERSION) from HZ_RELEVANCE_BASIC_CHANGE where RB_PROJECT_UID = #{projectPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CHANGE_STATUS=1 group by CHANGE_VERSION)

select
from HZ_RELEVANCE_BASIC_CHANGE where ID = (select ID from (select ID,MAX(CHANGE_VERSION) from HZ_RELEVANCE_BASIC_CHANGE where SRC_ID = #{srcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}))
